DOC.brief_summary: VL # FIA3-30 preparation intend topical use , apply penis , treatment ED .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Clinical Efficacy Local Topical Treatment Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: VasoLead 's preparation treat erectile dysfunction ( ED ) , VL # FIA3-30 , compose 2 active pharmaceutical ingredient , act vasodilator via different mechanism . Both currently use orally USA Europe treatment hypertension , angina pectoris disease .
DOC.criteria: Signed write informed consent . ED six month duration . IIEFEF domain score baseline 11 19 . Willingness minimum two sexual attempt short period study . At least 50 % unsuccessful sexual intercourse 4 attempt 4 different day . A stable heterosexual relationship partner six month . Age 25 75 year old . Neurological pathology ; Prior radical prostatectomy ; Any unstable medical psychiatric condition , spinal cord injury , penile anatomical abnormality ; Clinically significant chronic hematological disease ; Cardiovascular condition prevent sexual activity ( CHF severe coronary artery disease ) ; History myocardial infarction , stroke , lifethreatening arrhythmia within 6 month prior enrollment study ; Use antiandrogens , oral injectable androgen ; Documented hypotension ( BP 100 systolic 70 diastolic ) know orthostatic hypotension ; Routine use 2 antihypertensive medication ; Use oral nitrate within 3 month prior enrollment study ; Cancer within last 3 year ; Documented allergic reaction ; Investigators impression patient noncompliance ; Hepatic renal failure ; History HIV , hepatitis B , hepatitis C ; Is immediate family member personnel directly affiliate study investigative site , personally directly affiliate study investigative site ; Subject take investigational medication within 30 day prior entry study Employed VasoLead ( 2012 ) Ltd .
